product_name: JanSport Scout External Frame Pack - Youth
long_description: The JanSport Scout is a trustworthy, affordable external frame pack for the entry-level backpacker. It's designed to grow with you. Ergonomic S-curve shoulder straps and easily adjustable hipbelt offer comfort and load support. Breathable mesh lumbar cushion helps air circulate behind your back. Simple-to-adjust external aluminum frame accommodates a variety of torso lengths. Panel-loading design offers easy, suitcase-style access; 2 side pockets and 2 front pockets help you keep gear organized. Dual daisy chains on front panel allow you to add modular system pockets (not included); 2 side mesh bottle pockets keep water within easy reach. Sleeping bag lash points on bottom of pack offer additional gear loading options. The JanSport Scout external frame pack is made with tough, 600- and 300-denier polyester.
short_description: The JanSport Scout is a trustworthy, affordable external frame pack for the entry-level backpacker. It's designed to grow with you.
